```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(recommenderlab)

KR_shows <- read_delim("~/dorama_project/KR_shows.csv", "\t", escape_double = FALSE, col_names = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
colnames(KR_shows)<-c('dorama_id', 'dorama_title', 'overall_rating', 'watching', 'seasons', 'year', 'genres')

KR_shows$X7 <- NULL
colnames(KR_shows)<-c('dorama_id', 'dorama_title')

KR_shows2 <- KR_shows

KR_shows2 save.as
write.csv2(KR_shows2, "KR_shows2.csv")
```
